bio: Kjen is the eldest member of a party of three Nord warriors, the others being Sven and Maren. Kjen can often be found at Robber’s Refuge arguing with them. He likes Black-Briar mead. His friend Sven, often complains that Kjen is a liar. Despite this, he generally always backs Sven in an argument over Maren.
name: Kjen
